altername_name: 電波少年的懸賞生活ソフト なすびの部屋
Denpa Shounen-teki Kenshou Seikatsu Soft: Nasubi no Heya
name: Denpa Shonen-teki Kenshoseikatsu Soft Nasubi no Heya
overview: Denpa Shonenteki Kenshoseikatsu Soft Nasubi no Heya (電波少年的懸賞生活ソフト なすびの部屋) is a 1999 game by Hudson for the Sega Dreamcast. It ties into a Japanese reality show where a comedian willingly locked himself in a small apartment living off sweepstakes winnings until he won ¥1,000,000 worth of goods.
